verification.title: OTP Verification
verification.infoMessage: Send and verify OTP messages using our SMS service. Choose from various templates and customize your verification process.
verification.otpSentMessage: We've sent a verification code to {phone}. Please enter it below.
verification.previewNote: This is a preview of how your message will appear on WhatsApp. The actual OTP code will be generated when sent.
